title: 673: BITCOIN WILL SURGE 500-800% IN MASSIVE SUPERCYCLE IF BTC MIMICS 2013 BULL MARKET!!!!!
description:
Dan Held at crypto exchange Kraken, says that Bitcoin could surge by over 500% if BTC follows the cycle of its 2013 bull run.

“If we repeat 2013, we could see Bitcoin hitting between $300,000-$400,000 Bitcoin. Now. history usually rhymes, it doesn’t repeat itself, so it’s probably not going to be exactly that, but if it did, that would be my best price point.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net

itunes:subtitle: Dan Held, the director of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, says that Bitcoin could surge by over 500% if BTC follows the cycle of its 2013 bull run. In a new interview on Altcoin Daily, Held compares the current state of the cryptocurrency...
